## DisposableNode type

Linked list node for tracking dispose functions Used by RenderScope to track cleanup functions

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DisposableNode = {
    dispose: () => void;
    next: DisposableNode | undefined;
};
```
**References:** DisposableNode
